typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.MorphologyConcept
typeDescription.description: The concept type for all morphology concepts.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.MorphologyCodeConcept
typeDescription.description: The concept type for morphology concepts given by their codes.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.MorphologySpecialConcept
typeDescription.description: The concept type for morphology concepts mostly induced by some additional logic.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.TopographyConcept
typeDescription.description: The concept type for all topography concepts.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.TopographyCodeConcept
typeDescription.description: The concept type for topography concepts given by their code.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.TopographySpecialConcept
typeDescription.description: The concept type for special topography concepts mostly induced by some additional logic.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.BreastTopographyConcept
typeDescription.description: The concept type for topography concepts describing a part of breast.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.BreastQuadrant
typeDescription.description: Aggregating annotation for breast quadrants storing additional information.

featureDescription.name: clock
featureDescription.description: The location given by a clock value.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.LocationClock
typeDescription.description: The position/location given by a clock value.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.LocationSide
typeDescription.description: The location given by the side: R, L, T, U

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.LocationHorizontal
typeDescription.description: The position/location given by a horizontal orientation.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.LocationVertical
typeDescription.description: The position/location given by a vertical orientation.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.QuadrantElement
typeDescription.description: Abstract type for element of a quadrant.

featureDescription.name: kind
featureDescription.description: Label storing the type of indicator, e.g., VERTICAL or SIDE.

featureDescription.name: element
featureDescription.description: The value of the indicator annotation, e.g., BOTTOM or R

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.GleasonScore
typeDescription.description: The Gleason score.

featureDescription.name: occasion
featureDescription.description: The method by which the tissue sample was obtained , i.e. SURGERY or PUNCH.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.Receptor
typeDescription.description: A generic receptor providing a status and percentage.

featureDescription.name: status
featureDescription.description: The status with an interpretation, e.g., "++"".

featureDescription.name: percentage
featureDescription.description: The percentage represented as a measurement.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.EstrogenReceptor
typeDescription.description: A estrogen receptor providing a status and percentage.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.ProgesteroneReceptor
typeDescription.description: A progesterone receptor providing a status and percentage.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.HER2
typeDescription.description: A HER2 receptor providing a status and percentage.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.ReceptorStatus
typeDescription.description: The status of a receptor.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.TumorStage
typeDescription.description: Stage information describing a tumor mention.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.TumorStageIndicator
typeDescription.description: Indicator for a tumor stage representing a numeric value.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.TumorStageModifierIndicator
typeDescription.description: Indicator for a tumor stage modifier.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: Value of the tumor stage modifier indicator.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.Specimen
typeDescription.description: Specimen procedure information type.
